findings.message:
FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._total_liquidity_locked (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1243) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.rewardsPerToken() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1362-1375)
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.totalLiquidityLocked() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1410-1412)

findings.message:
FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._locked_liquidity (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1245) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.lockedLiquidityOf(address) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1415-1417)
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.userStakedFrax(address) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1455-1457)
findings.name: uninitialized-state

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sync_gauge_weights(bool) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1643-1655):
	External calls:
	- last_gauge_relative_weights[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).gauge_relative_weight_write(address(this),block.timestamp) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1650)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- last_gauge_time_totals[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).time_total() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1651)
	FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.last_gauge_time_totals (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1240) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.constructor(address,address[],address[],uint256[],address[]) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1292-1328)
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sync_gauge_weights(bool) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1643-1655)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._updateRewardAndBalance(address,bool) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1514-1547):
	External calls:
	- sync() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1517)
		- rewards_distributor.distributeReward(address(this)) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1604)
		- last_gauge_relative_weights[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).gauge_relative_weight_write(address(this),block.timestamp) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1650)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _total_combined_weight = _total_combined_weight + weight_diff (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1538)
	FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._total_combined_weight (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1244) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._total_combined_weight (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1244)
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.rewardsPerToken() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1362-1375)
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.totalCombinedWeight() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1420-1422)
	- _total_combined_weight = _total_combined_weight - weight_diff_scope_0 (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1542)
	FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._total_combined_weight (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1244) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._total_combined_weight (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1244)
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.rewardsPerToken() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1362-1375)
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.totalCombinedWeight() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1420-1422)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._getReward(address,address) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1580-1595):
	External calls:
	- TransferHelper.safeTransfer(rewardTokens[i],destination_address,rewards_before[i]) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1587)
	- updateRewardAndBalance(rewardee,true) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1580)
		- rewards_distributor.distributeReward(address(this)) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1604)
		- last_gauge_relative_weights[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).gauge_relative_weight_write(address(this),block.timestamp) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1650)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rewards[rewardee][i] = 0 (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1586)
	FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.rewards (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1235) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.earned(address) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1380-1395)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

	- vefxs_max_multiplier = _vefxs_max_multiplier (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1758) 
	- vefxs_per_frax_for_max_boost = _vefxs_per_frax_for_max_boost (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1759) 
	- vefxs_boost_scale_factor = _vefxs_boost_scale_factor (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1760)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._updateRewardAndBalance(address,bool) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1514-1547):
	External calls:
	- sync() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1517)
		- rewards_distributor.distributeReward(address(this)) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1604)
		- last_gauge_relative_weights[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).gauge_relative_weight_write(address(this),block.timestamp) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1650)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _combined_weights[account] = old_combined_weight + weight_diff (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1539)
	- _combined_weights[account] = old_combined_weight - weight_diff_scope_0 (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1543)
	- _vefxsMultiplierStored[account] = new_vefxs_multiplier (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1533)
	- _syncEarned(account) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1530)
		- rewards[account][i] = earned_arr[i] (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1556)
	- _syncEarned(account) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1530)
		- userRewardsPerTokenPaid[account][i_scope_0] = rewardsPerTokenStored[i_scope_0] (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1561)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sync() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1657-1667):
	External calls:
	- sync_gauge_weights(false) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1659)
		- last_gauge_relative_weights[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).gauge_relative_weight_write(address(this),block.timestamp) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1650)
	- retroCatchUp() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1662)
		- rewards_distributor.distributeReward(address(this)) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1604)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- retroCatchUp() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1662)
		- fraxPerLPStored = fraxPerLPToken() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1627)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate._getReward(address,address) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1580-1595):
	External calls:

	- updateRewardAndBalance(rewardee,true) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1580)

		- last_gauge_relative_weights[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).gauge_relative_weight_write(address(this),block.timestamp) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1650)

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sync() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1657-1667):
	External calls:
	- sync_gauge_weights(false) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1659)
		- last_gauge_relative_weights[i] = IFraxGaugeController(gauge_controller_address).gauge_relative_weight_write(address(this),block.timestamp) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1650)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _updateStoredRewardsAndTime() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1665)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1640)
	- _updateStoredRewardsAndTime() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1665)
		- rewardsPerTokenStored[i] = rewards_per_token[i] (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1636)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.retroCatchUp() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1602-1628):
	External calls:
	- rewards_distributor.distributeReward(address(this)) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1604)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fraxPerLPStored = fraxPerLPToken() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1627)
	- _updateStoredRewardsAndTime() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1624)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1640)
	- periodFinish = periodFinish + ((num_periods_elapsed + 1) * rewardsDuration) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1621)
	- _updateStoredRewardsAndTime() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1624)
		- rewardsPerTokenStored[i] = rewards_per_token[i] (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1636)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sync() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1657-1667) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= periodFinish (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1661)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.retroCatchUp() (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1602-1628) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)((rewardRates(i) * rewardsDuration * (num_periods_elapsed + 1)) <= ERC20(rewardTokens[i]).balanceOf(address(this)),string(abi.encodePacked(Not enough reward tokens available: ,rewardTokens[i]))) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1614)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sync_gauge_weights(bool) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1643-1655) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- force_update || (block.timestamp > last_gauge_time_totals[i]) (FraxUnifiedFarmTemplate.sol#1648)
findings.name: timestamp
